Work Experience

BIO

In Finland, I worked as a software developer for some period of time in prima power and Benete oy for school based projects. Additionally, I have worked for five organisations for different kind of studies including World Bank and United Nations in Ethiopia.

Software Developer

For Prima Power oy

Created SQL module which was used to integrate the existing data from third parties and on to the database Created numerous from simple to complex queries and correlated subqueries.

Front End Developer

For Benete oy

Working in a team creating an application(app) for our client company Benete Oy, which helps their customers in installation and maintenance of their product.

Training and Research Supervisor

United nations

Main activities and responsibilities: Consultancy Supervisor for WORLD FOOD PROGRAM HIV/AIDS livelihood vulnerability study.
